AltName.entry: FRIENDS OF HEELEY AND MEERSBROOK ALLOTMENTS

Desc.entry: A community garden established in 2001 on the old Carfield farm site which now forms part of Meersbrook allotments. Consists of an orchard area, a wildlife area with a bird hide, a soft fruit area and a large herb garden.

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: Monthly (committee meeting), 1st Sun in the month 10.30am-1.30pm (work morning, all welcome)
